task.title: Retrieve Discarded Nodes
task.shortdesc: Discarded nodes can be returned to the shelf in two ways:

step.cmd: Click and drag the node from the Discard Bin to the shelf.
Find the node that you wish to retrieve in the Discard Bin.
Click on the desired node where it appears in the Discard Bin.
OR, to retrieve all discarded nodes, after clicking "Retrieve" click "Discarded" in the Sets bar.
